<<<<<<< HEAD
Two sheets for poor families ... by Richard Baxter. Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
2 pts.
Printed by Robert White for Francis Tyton ... and for Nevill Simmons ..., London : 1665.
Pt. 1 has subtitle: The first, instructions to the ungodly for their conversion; pt. 2 has special t.p. with title: Instructions for a holy life. Copy at reel 201:18 (B1441) is complete work; copy at reel 269:6 (B1403) is pt. 2 only. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
Two sheets for poor families ... by Richard Baxter. Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
2 pts.
Printed by Robert White for Francis Tyton ... and for Nevill Simmons ..., London : 1665.
Pt. 1 has subtitle: The first, instructions to the ungodly for their conversion; pt. 2 has special t.p. with title: Instructions for a holy life. Copy at reel 201:18 (B1441) is complete work; copy at reel 269:6 (B1403) is pt. 2 only. Reproduction of original in British Library.
Francis Tyton
Nevill Simmons
Robert White
